mapper.sql: id, parent_id, title, name, parent_title, level, component, redirect, path, icon, is_link, is_hide, is_full, is_affix, is_keep_alive, sort, creator, updater, create_time, update_time, del
mapper.select: SELECT pam.id, pam.parent_id, pam.title, pam.name, pam.parent_title, pam.level, pam.component, pam.redirect, pam.path, pam.icon, pam.is_link, pam.is_hide, pam.is_full, pam.is_affix, pam.is_keep_alive, pam.sort, pam.creator, pam.updater, pam.create_time, pam.update_time, pam.del FROM pisces_auth_menu pam INNER JOIN pisces_auth_role_menu parm ON pam.id = parm.menu_id INNER JOIN pisces_auth_user_role paur ON parm.role_id = paur.role_id INNER JOIN pisces_auth_user pau ON paur.user_id = pau.id WHERE pam.del = 1 AND pau.del = 1 AND pau.id = #{userId} ORDER BY pam.sort

SELECT
FROM pisces_auth_menu WHERE del = '1'
AND ( title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryKey} ,'%') OR name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryKey} ,'%') )
ORDER BY sort
mapper.update: UPDATE pisces_auth_menu SET del = '0' WHERE id = #{menuId}
mapper.select: SELECT pam.id, pam.parent_id, pam.title, pam.name, pam.parent_title, pam.level, pam.component, pam.redirect, pam.path, pam.icon, pam.is_link, pam.is_hide, pam.is_full, pam.is_affix, pam.is_keep_alive, pam.sort, pam.creator, pam.updater, pam.create_time, pam.update_time, pam.del FROM pisces_auth_menu pam INNER JOIN pisces_auth_role_menu parm ON pam.id = parm.menu_id WHERE pam.del = '1' AND parm.role_id = #{roleId}
